Package org.apache.tamaya.spi

Interface ClassloaderAware

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ServiceContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultServiceContext, JavaConfigurationPropertySource, OSGIServiceContext
    public interface ClassloaderAware

    This interface models a provider that serves configuration properties that is also dependent on the target classloader of the current configuration.

    See Also:
    PropertySource, Implementation Requirements Implementations of this interface must be Thread safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ClassLoader getClassLoader()
      Get the currently assigned cassloader instance.
      void init​(ClassLoader classLoader)
      Initializes this instance with the classloader to be used.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init​(ClassLoader classLoader)
        Initializes this instance with the classloader to be used. This method is called by the implementation when the instance is loaded through the ServiceContextManager.
        Parameters:
        classLoader - the target classloader, not not null.

      • getClassLoader

        ClassLoader getClassLoader()
        Get the currently assigned cassloader instance.
        Returns:
        the classloader, never null.
